name: WhiskTube
body:
WhiskTube is a Node.js local webapp for downloading videos from YouTube to save them later. It's quite easy to use provided you have some knowledge of terminals/node.js.

To install, download the project. You will need [Node.js](http://nodejs.org) and NPM. Then, run `npm install` to install the project's dependencies. After that, `npm start` starts WhiskTube. You can access it via the link provided.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
